info.name: Fato
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Gio Ponti

MATERIALS:
A table or wall lamp, with geometrical metal screens creating light and dark, screened and clear, all enclosed in a square frame: it is both a light object and a lamp. A lighting sculpture with a strong styling connotation to the â€˜60s. Structure in white enamelled, folded and welded plate.
